Now Moses<S>4872</S> kept<S>1961</S> <S>7462</S> the flock<S>6629</S> of Jethro<S>3503</S> his father in law<S>2859</S>, the priest<S>3548</S> of Midian<S>4080</S>: and he led<S>5090</S> the flock<S>6629</S> to the backside<S>310</S> of the desert<S>4057</S>, and came<S>935</S> to the mountain<S>2022</S> of God<S>430</S>, even to Horeb<S>2722</S>.
And the angel<S>4397</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> appeared<S>7200</S> unto him in a flame<S>3827</S> of fire<S>784</S> out of the midst<S>8432</S> of a bush<S>5572</S>: and he looked<S>7200</S>, and, behold, the bush<S>5572</S> burned<S>1197</S> with fire<S>784</S>, and the bush<S>5572</S> was not consumed<S>398</S>.
And Moses<S>4872</S> said<S>559</S>, I will now turn aside<S>5493</S>, and see<S>7200</S> this great<S>1419</S> sight<S>4758</S>, why<S>4069</S> the bush<S>5572</S> is not burnt<S>1197</S>.
And when the LORD<S>3068</S> saw<S>7200</S> that he turned aside<S>5493</S> to see<S>7200</S>, God<S>430</S> called<S>7121</S> unto him out of the midst<S>8432</S> of the bush<S>5572</S>, and said<S>559</S>, Moses<S>4872</S>, Moses<S>4872</S>. And he said<S>559</S>, Here am I.
And he said<S>559</S>, Draw not nigh<S>7126</S> hither<S>1988</S>: put off<S>5394</S> thy shoes<S>5275</S> from off thy feet<S>7272</S>, for the place<S>4725</S> whereon<S>834</S> thou standest<S>5975</S> is holy<S>6944</S> ground<S>127</S>.
Moreover he said<S>559</S>, I am the God<S>430</S> of thy father<S>1</S>, the God<S>430</S> of Abraham<S>85</S>, the God<S>430</S> of Isaac<S>3327</S>, and the God<S>430</S> of Jacob<S>3290</S>. And Moses<S>4872</S> hid<S>5641</S> his face<S>6440</S>; for he was afraid<S>3372</S> to look<S>5027</S> upon God<S>430</S>.
And the LORD<S>3068</S> said<S>559</S>, I have surely<S>7200</S> seen<S>7200</S> the affliction<S>6040</S> of my people<S>5971</S> which are in Egypt<S>4714</S>, and have heard<S>8085</S> their cry<S>6818</S> by reason<S>6440</S> of their taskmasters<S>5065</S>; for I know<S>3045</S> their sorrows<S>4341</S>;
And I am come down<S>3381</S> to deliver<S>5337</S> them out of the hand<S>3027</S> of the Egyptians<S>4714</S>, and to bring<S>5927</S> them up out of that land<S>776</S> unto a good<S>2896</S> land<S>776</S> and a large<S>7342</S>, unto a land<S>776</S> flowing<S>2100</S> with milk<S>2461</S> and honey<S>1706</S>; unto the place<S>4725</S> of the Canaanites<S>3669</S>, and the Hittites<S>2850</S>, and the Amorites<S>567</S>, and the Perizzites<S>6522</S>, and the Hivites<S>2340</S>, and the Jebusites<S>2983</S>.
Now therefore, behold, the cry<S>6818</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> is come<S>935</S> unto me: and I have also seen<S>7200</S> the oppression<S>3906</S> wherewith the Egyptians<S>4714</S> oppress<S>3905</S> them.
Come<S>3212</S> now therefore, and I will send<S>7971</S> thee unto Pharaoh<S>6547</S>, that thou mayest bring forth<S>3318</S> my people<S>5971</S> the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> out of Egypt<S>4714</S>.
And Moses<S>4872</S> said<S>559</S> unto God<S>430</S>, Who am I, that I should go<S>3212</S> unto Pharaoh<S>6547</S>, and that I should bring forth<S>3318</S> the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> out of Egypt<S>4714</S>?
And he said<S>559</S>, Certainly I will be with thee; and this shall be a token<S>226</S> unto thee, that<S>3588</S> I have sent<S>7971</S> thee: When thou hast brought forth<S>3318</S> the people<S>5971</S> out of Egypt<S>4714</S>, ye shall serve<S>5647</S> God<S>430</S> upon this mountain<S>2022</S>.
And Moses<S>4872</S> said<S>559</S> unto God<S>430</S>, Behold, when I come<S>935</S> unto the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, and shall say<S>559</S> unto them, The God<S>430</S> of your fathers<S>1</S> hath sent<S>7971</S> me unto you; and they shall say<S>559</S> to me, What is his name<S>8034</S>? what shall I say<S>559</S> unto them?
And God<S>430</S> said<S>559</S> unto Moses<S>4872</S>, I AM<S>1961</S> THAT I AM<S>1961</S>: and he said<S>559</S>, Thus shalt thou say<S>559</S> unto the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, I AM hath sent<S>7971</S> me unto you.
And God<S>430</S> said<S>559</S> moreover<S>5750</S> unto Moses<S>4872</S>, Thus shalt thou say<S>559</S> unto the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, The LORD<S>3068</S> God<S>430</S> of your fathers<S>1</S>, the God<S>430</S> of Abraham<S>85</S>, the God<S>430</S> of Isaac<S>3327</S>, and the God<S>430</S> of Jacob<S>3290</S>, hath sent<S>7971</S> me unto you: this is my name<S>8034</S> for ever<S>5769</S>, and this is my memorial<S>2143</S> unto all<S>1755</S> generations<S>1755</S>.
Go<S>3212</S>, and gather<S>622</S> the elders<S>2205</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> together<S>622</S>, and say<S>559</S> unto them, The LORD<S>3068</S> God<S>430</S> of your fathers<S>1</S>, the God<S>430</S> of Abraham<S>85</S>, of Isaac<S>3327</S>, and of Jacob<S>3290</S>, appeared<S>7200</S> unto me, saying<S>559</S>, I have surely<S>6485</S> visited<S>6485</S> you, and seen that which is done<S>6213</S> to you in Egypt<S>4714</S>:
And I have said<S>559</S>, I will bring<S>5927</S> you up out of the affliction<S>6040</S> of Egypt<S>4714</S> unto the land<S>776</S> of the Canaanites<S>3669</S>, and the Hittites<S>2850</S>, and the Amorites<S>567</S>, and the Perizzites<S>6522</S>, and the Hivites<S>2340</S>, and the Jebusites<S>2983</S>, unto a land<S>776</S> flowing<S>2100</S> with milk<S>2461</S> and honey<S>1706</S>.
And they shall hearken<S>8085</S> to thy voice<S>6963</S>: and thou shalt come<S>935</S>, thou and the elders<S>2205</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, unto the king<S>4428</S> of Egypt<S>4714</S>, and ye shall say<S>559</S> unto him, The LORD<S>3068</S> God<S>430</S> of the Hebrews<S>5680</S> hath met<S>7136</S> with us: and now let us go<S>3212</S>, we beseech thee, three<S>7969</S> days'<S>3117</S> journey<S>1870</S> into the wilderness<S>4057</S>, that we may sacrifice<S>2076</S> to the LORD<S>3068</S> our God<S>430</S>.
And I am sure<S>3045</S> that the king<S>4428</S> of Egypt<S>4714</S> will not let<S>5414</S> you go<S>1980</S>, no, not by a mighty<S>2389</S> hand<S>3027</S>. <sup>no: or, but by strong hand</sup>
And I will stretch out<S>7971</S> my hand<S>3027</S>, and smite<S>5221</S> Egypt<S>4714</S> with all my wonders<S>6381</S> which I will do<S>6213</S> in the midst<S>7130</S> thereof: and after<S>310</S> that he will let you go<S>7971</S>.
And I will give<S>5414</S> this people<S>5971</S> favour<S>2580</S> in the sight<S>5869</S> of the Egyptians<S>4714</S>: and it shall come to pass, that, when ye go<S>3212</S>, ye shall not go<S>3212</S> empty<S>7387</S>:
But every woman<S>802</S> shall borrow<S>7592</S> of her neighbour<S>7934</S>, and of her that sojourneth<S>1481</S> in her house<S>1004</S>, jewels<S>3627</S> of silver<S>3701</S>, and jewels<S>3627</S> of gold<S>2091</S>, and raiment<S>8071</S>: and ye shall put<S>7760</S> them upon your sons<S>1121</S>, and upon your daughters<S>1323</S>; and ye shall spoil<S>5337</S> the Egyptians<S>4714</S>. <sup>the Egyptians: or, Egypt</sup>
